original_text: Perhaps when the people of Judah hear about every disaster I plan to inflict on them, they will each turn from their wicked ways; then I will forgive their wickedness and their sin.”
korean_text: 유다 가문이 내가 그들에게 내리려 한 모든 재난을 듣고 각기 악한 길에서 돌이키리니 그리하면 내가 그 악과 죄를 용서하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Perhaps when the people of Judah hear
about every disaster I plan to inflict on them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 내릴 모든 재앙에 대하여

sentences.original_text: they will each turn from their wicked ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 각각 악한 길에서 돌이킬 것이라

sentences.original_text: then I will forgive their wickedness
